title: Only the first 15 characters of a comment will be sent
author: Volodymyr Mutaf
actual result:
**Steps to reproduce:**

1. open [https://response-form-2.herokuapp.com](https://response-form-2.herokuapp.com)
2. enter any name
3. enter any comment over 15 characters

**Expected result:**
entire comment has been sent
**Actual result:**
only the first 15 characters have been sent

title: Wrong format date MM/DD/YYYY
author: Volodymyr Mutaf
actual result: **Steps to reproduce:** 1. open [https://response-form-2.herokuapp.com](https://response-form-2.herokuapp.com) 2. select any date **Expected result:** Date format must be DD.MM.YY **Actual result:** Date format is MM/DD/YYYY
